EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/Redmonk Open Source Playbook_Q116.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=dsc-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Pivotal-Redmonk-OSS-webinar-Q116]]> JANUARY 13, 2016 9:00 AM PST / 5:00 PM GMT REGISTER <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=dsc-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Pivotal-Redmonk-OSS-webinar-Q116]]> Enterprises are increasingly realizing that an active open source strategy is critical to transforming their business in the software-driven economy. In this webinar, Pivotal and RedMonk will explore:
- Why open source is critical to digital transformation - How following best practices can help you avoid pitfalls - Where you should start to make changes and gain quick wins Join us <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=dsc-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Pivotal-Redmonk-OSS-webinar-Q116]]> on January 13th for RedMonk’s market perspective, Pivotal’s portfolio perspective and apply both to drive your open source strategy in 2016 and beyond.
